Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- 1st Justice of the Peace Ward
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Assumption Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 2 -- 6 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Recreation District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year 6 mills renewal property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the recreational facilities of the District, including necessary equipment in connection therewith.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 2 of the Parish of Assumption, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of six (6) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022 (an estimated $130,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the recreational facilities of the District, including necessary equipment in connection therewith?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drain. Dist. #2 -- .35 per acre acreage tax-BOC-10Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District Number Two Proposition
(Acreage Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority for Gravity Drainage District Number Two of the Parish of Assumption, Louisiana to continue to levy a 10-year .35 per acre acreage tax for the purpose of maintaining, improving and keeping in repair the system of gravity drainage constructed in said District.
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District Number Two of the Parish of Assumption, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect an acreage tax of Thirty-Five Cents ($.35) per acre on each and every acre of land in said District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022 (an estimated $9,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of maintaining, improving and keeping in repair the system of gravity drainage constructed in said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Oakridge Grav. Drain. Dist.#8 -- $35 parcel fee - BOC - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Oakridge Gravity Drainage District #8 Proposition
(Parcel Fee Renewal)

Summary:  Continue to levy a 15 year $35 parcel fee for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said District for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds.
Race.FullText: Shall Oakridge Gravity Drainage District #8 of the Parish of Assumption, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect an annual parcel fee of Thirty-Five Dollars ($35.00) on each lot, sub-divided portion of ground and/or individual tract located in said District for a period of fifteen (15) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2027 (an estimated $6,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the fee for an entire year), in the manner set out in Section 2740.16 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950 for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said District for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds?

Race.SpecificTitle: Knotts Subdiv. GDD #11 -- $25 Parcel Fee - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Knotts Subdivision Gravity Drainage District No. 11 Proposition
(Parcel Fee Renewal)

Summary: Authority for Knotts Subdivision Gravity Drainage District No. 11 to continue to levy a 10-year $25 annual parcel fee for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said district for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds.
Race.FullText: Shall Knotts Subdivision Gravity Drainage District No. 11 of the Parish of Assumption, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect an annual parcel fee of Twenty-Five ($25.00) on each lot, sub-divided portion of ground and/or individual tract located in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022 (an estimated $2,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), in the manner set out in Section 2740.16 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said District for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds?

Race.SpecificTitle: LA 70 Lee Dr. GDD #14 -- $60 Parcel Fee - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
LA. 70 Lee Drive Gravity Drainage District #14 Proposition 
(Parcel Fee Renewal)
 
Summary:  Authority for LA. 70 Lee Drive Gravity Drainage District #14 to continue to levy a 10-year $60 annual parcel fee for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said District for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds.
Race.FullText: Shall LA. 70 Lee Drive Gravity Drainage District #14, of the Parish of Assumption, Louisiana, continue to levy and collect an annual parcel fee of Sixty ($60.00) on each lot, sub-divided portion of ground and/or individual tract located in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022 (an estimated $8,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the fee for an entire year), in the manner set out in Section 2740.16 of Title 33 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, for the purpose of paying the cost of constructing and maintaining levees, levee drainage, flood protection, hurricane flood protection, and all purposes incidental thereto, including paying compensation for the exercise of permanent or temporary servitudes, and to pay, in whole or in part, the payment of principal and interest on bonds of said District for any of the capital purposes set forth above, including any necessary reserve therefor and paying the costs of issuing such bonds?
